content.0: Cowboy Hat/The leather is old and cracked, but surprisingly supple. It smells musty./false/true
content.3: Sombrero/A festively decorated hat made from woven straw./false/true
content.4: Straw Hat/Light and cool, it's a farmer's delight./false/true
content.5: Official Cap/Looks like it belonged to a postman or policeman. Either way, it's still very soft and smells okay./false/true
content.6: Blue Bonnet/Harken back to simpler times with this prairie bonnet./false/true
content.8: Skeleton Mask/The red eyes are glowing mysteriously./true/true
content.9: Goblin Mask/Freak out the neighborhood with this creepy mask. Rubber ear joints for effect./true/true
content.10: Chicken Mask/You'll be sure to get them grinning with this one./true/true
content.11: Earmuffs/Keep your ears toasty. Lined with artisanal velvet from Castle Village./true/false
content.12: Delicate Bow/Little pink jewels glisten as you examine it./true/false
content.13: Tropiclip/It's shaped like a little palm tree./true/false
content.14: Butterfly Bow/This one is very soft./true/false
content.15: Hunter's Cap/The wool lining should stay warm deep into the forest./false/true
content.16: Trucker Hat/Mesh in the back to keep your head cool./false/true
content.18: Good Ol' Cap/A floppy old topper with a creased bill. Looks like it's been through a lot./false/true
content.20: Cool Cap/It looks really faded, but it used to be a vibrant blue./false/true
content.21: Lucky Bow/The middle is made of solid gold./true/false
content.22: Polka Bow/This one's sure to be turn heads./true/false
content.23: Gnome's Cap/This gnome had a very large head./false/true
content.24: Eye Patch/You can't tell if it's real or just from a costume shop./true/true
content.26: Tiara/This one has a big amethyst encircled by gold./true/true
content.27: Hard Hat/Keep your dome in one piece./false/true
content.28: Sou'wester/The shape helps to keep sailors dry during storms./false/true
content.29: Daisy/A fresh spring daisy to put in your hair./true/false
content.30: Watermelon Band/The color scheme was inspired by the beloved summer melon./true/false
content.33: Cowgal Hat/The band is studded with fake diamonds./false/true
content.35: Archer's Cap/Fashionable whether you're an archer or not./false/true
content.37: Blue Cowboy Hat/A denim cowboy hat in cool blue./false/true
content.38: Red Cowboy Hat/An eye-catching cowboy hat in red suede./false/true
content.39: Cone Hat/A curiosity from a distant land./false/true
content.40: Living Hat/It absorbs moisture from your scalp. No watering needed!/false/true
content.41: Emily's Magic Hat/Made with love by Emily. It's 100% organic!/false/true
content.43: Dinosaur Hat/A hat fashioned to look like a small dinosaur./false/true
content.44: Totem Mask/Don't worry, it won't warp your face.../true/true
content.45: Logo Cap/A red cap with a logo on the front./false/true
content.46: Wearable Dwarf Helm/A slightly larger, human sized version of the helmets worn by dwarves./hide/true
content.47: Fashion Hat/A fashionable hat with a feather in the brim./false/true
content.48: Pumpkin Mask/This must have been a pretty big pumpkin once.../hide/true
content.49: Hair Bone/A prehistoric version of the hair bow./true/false
content.50: Knight's Helmet/It looks just like the real thing!/hide/true
content.51: Squire's Helmet/The face is exposed to increase air flow./hide/true
content.52: Spotted Headscarf/A red polka-dot scarf tied around the head./hide/true
content.53: Beanie/A warm hat with a pretty tight fit./hide/true
content.54: Floppy Beanie/A warm hat with a looser fit./hide/true
content.55: Fishing Hat/The wide brim keeps you shaded when you're fishing on the riverbank./false/true
content.56: Blobfish Mask/Just as spongy as the real thing!/true/true
content.57: Party Hat/A goofy red hat that makes any celebration more fun./false/true
content.58: Party Hat/A goofy blue hat that makes any celebration more fun./false/true
content.59: Party Hat/A goofy green hat that makes any celebration more fun./false/true
content.60: Arcane Hat/The type of cowboy hat worn by a wizard./false/true
content.61: Chef Hat/The traditional hat worn by a head chef./hide/true
content.62: Pirate Hat/A captain's hat with a horrible skull on the front./false/true
content.63: Flat Topped Hat/An old style of hat once considered very fashionable./false/true
content.64: Elegant Turban/A fine black silk turban with gold trim./false/true
content.65: White Turban/A fine white silk turban with blue trim./false/true
content.66: Garbage Hat/It's a garbage can lid 'upcycled' into a hat.../false/true
content.67: Golden Mask/A faithful recreation of the Calico Desert relic!/true/true
content.68: Propeller Hat/A goofy hat with a propeller on top./false/true
content.69: Bridal Veil/The traditional headwear for a bride./false/true
content.70: Witch Hat/A pointy hat popular with witches./false/true
content.71: Copper Pan/You place the copper pan on your head.../false/true
content.72: Green Turban/A green silk turban with a gold ornament on the front./false/true
content.73: Magic Cowboy Hat/It's shimmering with prismatic energy/false/true/Prismatic
content.74: Magic Turban/It's shimmering with prismatic energy/false/true/Prismatic
content.75: Golden Helmet/It's half of a golden coconut./false/true
content.76: Deluxe Pirate Hat/Only the most infamous pirate could pull off this look./false/true
content.77: Pink Bow/This huge bow makes quite a statement!/true/false
content.78: Frog Hat/A slimy friend that lives on your dome./hide/true
content.79: Small Cap/It's a more aerodynamic style of cap./false/true
content.80: Bluebird Mask/Wear this to look just like your favorite island trader./hide/true
content.81: Deluxe Cowboy Hat/A cowboy hat with a more extreme shape./false/true
content.82: Mr. Qi's Hat/A replica of Mr. Qi's iconic hat./false/true
content.83: Dark Cowboy Hat/A cowboy hat in fashionable black./false/true
content.84: Radioactive Goggles/Doesn't actually provide any protection from radiation./true/true
content.87: Star Helmet/A red hat with stars on it./false/true
content.88: Sunglasses/These give you a relaxed look./true/true
content.89: Goggles/These will make you look very safe./true/true
